titles.title: Almighty God Your Word Is Cast

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Almighty God, Your Word is cast Like seed into the ground; Now let the dew of Heav'n descend, And righteous fruits abound.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let not the foe of Christ and man This holy seed remove, But give it root in ev'ry heart To bring forth fruits of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let not the world's deceitful cares The rising plant destroy. But let it yield a hundredfold The fruits of peace and joy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Nor let Your Word so kindly sent To raise us to Your throne Return to You, and sadly tell That we reject Your Son.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Oft as the precious seed is sown, Your quick'ning grace bestow, That all whose souls the truth receive, Its saving power may know.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Great God, come down and on Your Word
Your mighty power bestow,
That all who hear the joyful sound,
Your saving grace may know.
